AdhocQueryRequest.SQLQuery: SELECT * FROM ExternalLink el, Association a, ExternalIdentifier ei, ExtrinsicObject eo WHERE a.associationType = 'ExternallyLinks' AND a.targetObject = eo.id AND a.sourceObject = el.id AND eo.id = ei.registryobject AND ei.identificationScheme='urn:uuid:58a6f841-87b3-4a3e-92fd-a8ffeff98427' AND ei.value='NIST-1234^^^&1.3.6.1.4.1.21367.2005.1.1&ISO^PI' AND eo.status = 'Approved'
